mapper.insert: INSERT INTO tin_templatecontent(id, templateId, componentId, title, promptField, fieldSequence, groupSequence ) VALUES (#{id},#{templateId},#{componentId},#{title},#{promptField},#{fieldSequence},#{groupSequence})
mapper.update: UPDATE tin_templatecontent SET tin_templatecontent.templateId=#{templateId}, tin_templatecontent.componentId=#{componentId}, tin_templatecontent.title=#{title}, tin_templatecontent.promptField=#{promptField}, tin_templatecontent.fieldSequence=#{fieldSequence}, tin_templatecontent.groupSequence=#{groupSequence} WHERE id = #{id}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO tin_template (id, templateName, templateGroupId, staffID, postscript, isUsable, groupSequence, isFinish) VALUES (#{id},#{templateName},#{templateGroupId},#{staffID},#{postscript},#{isUsable},#{groupSequence},#{isFinish})
mapper.update: UPDATE tin_template SET tin_template.templateGroupId=#{templateGroupId}, tin_template.templateName=#{templateName}, tin_template.groupSequence=#{groupSequence}, tin_template.isFinish=#{isFinish}, tin_template.postscript=#{postscript}, tin_template.isUsable=#{isUsable}, tin_template.staffID=#{staffID} WHERE tin_template.id = #{id}
mapper.select: select tin_templategroup.id AS templateGroupId, tin_templategroup.templateGroupName AS templateGroupName, tin_template.id AS templateId, tin_template.templateName AS templateName, tin_template.postscript AS postscript from tin_templategroup, tin_template where tin_template.isUsable = 0 and tin_templategroup.isUsable = 0 and tin_template.templategroupID = tin_templategroup.id order by tin_templategroup.groupSequence
select id, templateId, componentId, title, fieldSequence, isUsable, groupSequence from tin_templatecontent where templateId= #{templateId} order by groupSequence ,fieldSequence asc
select groupId, groupSequence from tin_componentlibrary WHERE isUsable = 0 order by groupSequence
